entry.value: SELECT DISTINCT cast(cur.id_linea AS int) AS id_linea FROM de_bsf_2cur.dim_prestamos cur LEFT JOIN de_bsf_1raw.param_linea_prestamo_segmentos par ON cur.id_linea = cast(par.id_linea AS int) WHERE par.id_linea IS NULL
